mainText:
To a transformer of the way the world uses and excels in technology, thank
you for enabling the generation to open so many doors to new innovations and
ideas, for giving aspiring geniuses hope and drive in this life. You were a
true legend and the respect that I, many other Mac's, and PCs even, have for
you goes above and beyond. Thank you for giving me motivation to chase
dreams, no matter how out of this world they may be, you're ideas and dreams
put to real life are proof that nothing is impossible. May you rest in the
sweetest peace, Steve Jobs.
author: Alexa
